statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating <= 2 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating ASC, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, rating, comment FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM review WHERE LENGTH(review_text) > 100;
SELECT customer_id, review_text, timestamp FROM review ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT review_text, timestamp FROM review WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE rating <= 2;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 789 AND rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customers.customer_name, reviews.rating, reviews.review_text FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, feedback.timestamp, feedback.feedback_text FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id INNER JOIN feedback ON reviews.review_id = feedback.review_id ORDER BY feedback.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customers_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customer_ratings WHERE rating_value > 3 ORDER BY rating_date ASC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM feedback_responses WHERE feedback_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426654174000';
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = 'c8b8e499-316a-4e4f-8e4e-d36e278ca1a7';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customers_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_text FROM feedback_responses WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM customers_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT rating_value, rating_date FROM customer_ratings WHERE customer_id = '9bdffa12-437a-45cf-a2c5-3d6fe14f5178' ORDER BY rating_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM review_replies WHERE reply_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY reply_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT review_id, customer_id, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM reviews GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT review_id, comment FROM reviews WHERE rating = 5
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reviews > 2
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' AND created_at <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM reviews
